verbose_text: The levels of 3-chlorotyrosine and 3-nitrotyrosine in HDLs were reduced significantly with 12 weeks of the Mediterranean diet and exercise (P < 0.05) (XREF_FIG), indicating decreased MPO activity even before changes in HDL levels are apparent.
evidence: 3-nitrotyrosine in HDLs were reduced significantly with 12 weeks of the Mediterranean diet and exercise (P < 0.05) ( XREF_FIG ), indicating decreased MPO
